alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 11:36PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Weakley, central Gibson, northwestern Benton, northern Carroll and Henry Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1135 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near South Fulton to near Kenton to near Newbern. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martin, Paris, McKenzie, Trenton, Huntingdon, Paris Landing State Park, Dresden, Dyer, Greenfield, Gleason, Rutherford, Bradford, Sharon, Atwood, Cottage Grove, Latham, Vale, Springville, Routon and Palmersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
